data.what_is:
Next4biz CRM is a new generation CRM with digital behavior analysis, marketing & sales automation, and AI powered end-to-end customer service management features.

Marketing & sales features:
   - Integration to legacy systems with data deduplication
   - Customer's digital footprint monitoring
   - Dynamic segmentation, KPI and scorecard management
   - Rule-based marketing & sales automation
   - Opportunity and task management

Customer service management features:
   - Omnichannel communication
   - AI powered complaint categorization
   - User interface and agent script design for categories
   - End-to-end complaint management with workflows
   - Knowledge base and self service

Next4biz CRM is a no-code solution bringing less IT dependency and more agility for sales & service teams.

Next4biz CRM can be 2-way integrated with other systems.

Next4biz CRM is compliant with GDPR, CCPA, KVKK.
